ComponentDescription: AWS Greengrass V2 Component SDK recipe for Bluetooth (BLE) IoT Gateway Component.

aws-greengrass-labs-bluetooth-gateway:pu.policyDescription: Allows access to publish to the component IPC data topic and application IPC broadcast topic (and / or others as required).

aws-greengrass-labs-bluetooth-gateway:su.policyDescription: Allows access to subscribe to the component IPC service topic and application IPC broadcast topic (and / or others as required).

aws-greengrass-labs-bluetooth-gateway:pu.policyDescription: Allows access to publish to the component MQTT data topic and application MQTT broadcast topic(and / or others as required).

aws-greengrass-labs-bluetooth-gateway:su.policyDescription: Allows access to subscribe to the component MQTT service topic and application MQTT broadcast topic (and / or others as required).

Install.Script: python3 -m venv ble; . ble/bin/activate; pip3 install --upgrade pip; pip3 install -r {artifacts:decompressedPath}/src/requirements.txt
